statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); dir="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; branch=$(git -C "$cwd" symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git -C "$cwd" diff --no-ext-diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -C "$cwd" diff --no-ext-diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || branch="$branch*"; git_info=" [$branch]"; fi; used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); [ -n "$used" ] && ctx=" (ctx: ${used}%)"; printf "\033[32m%s\033[34m@\033[36m%s \033[33m%s\033[34m%s\033[36m%s\033[0m" "$user" "$host" "$dir" "$git_info" "$ctx"
